turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. Could I get a caramel macchiato grande size from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: good afternoon, what can i do for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want whole milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. which starbucks do you want me to place this order at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i wrote down that you wanted 1 hot grande caramel macchiato with whole milk from the starbucks in shawnberg illinois.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for your order is $4.50. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order has been submitted. it'll b ready for pick up in 15 mins.
